# Security Policy

## Supported Version

| **Version** | **Minecraft Java Version (Target)** | **Support** |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|
| 2.5.0 | 1.14.4 | ✔ |
| < 2.5.0 | | ❌ |

## Report Vulnerability

Submit the issue via [GitHub](https://github.com/hugoalh/Minecraft.Java.DataPack.NoItemDespawn/issues).
